sentences.en: Aflatoxin B 1 ( AFTB 1 ) has strong toxicity, which was ranked A carcinogen by international cancer organization in 1988.
sentences.cn: 黄曲霉毒素 B1 具有很强的毒性, 1988年被国际癌症机构列为A类致癌物质.

sentences.en: Also included in the green group of vegetables are broccoli, Brussels sprouts, and cabbage, which are, like cauliflower , cruciferous vegetables and contain powerful carcinogen blockers.
sentences.cn: 椰菜、抱子甘蓝和卷心菜也属于绿色组蔬菜，像菜花那样，都是十字花科蔬菜并且含有强有效的致癌物质阻断剂。

sentences.en: Also included in the green group of vegetables are broccoli, Brussels sprouts, and cabbage, which are, like cauliflower, cruciferous vegetables and contain powerful carcinogen blockers.
sentences.cn: 椰菜、抱子甘蓝和卷心菜也属于绿色组蔬菜，像菜花那样，都是十字花科蔬菜并且含有强有效的致癌物质阻断剂。

sentences.en: Cankered material can produce effluvial carcinogen aldehyde . 2.
sentences.cn: 腐烂的物质可以产生恶臭的致癌物质乙醛.

sentences.en: Chemical carcinogens generally require metabolic conversion to some form of " ultimate " carcinogen.
sentences.cn: 化学致癌物一般需要通过代谢来转换成某种形式的 “ 最终 ” 致癌物.

sentences.en: Colgate - Palmolive's toothpaste was said to contain a carcinogen.
sentences.cn: 高露洁的牙膏也被说含有致癌物质.

sentences.en: Colgate - Palmolive's toothpaste was said to contain a carcinogen.
sentences.cn: 高露洁的牙膏也被指含有致癌物质.

sentences.en: He does say the carcinogen cadmium is no longer in use.
sentences.cn: 不过他说，致癌物质镉已经不再使用。

sentences.en: Human hazards of acrylamide: the animal experiments show that, acrylamide is a kind of potential carcinogen.
sentences.cn: 丙烯酰胺对人体的危害: 动物试验显示, 丙烯酰胺是一种可能致癌物.

sentences.en: It has many advantages, such as high efficiency, safety, good nutritive value and non - carcinogen.
sentences.cn: 它具有高效 、 安全 、 有一定营养价值、无任何致癌因素等特点.

sentences.en: It is reported that the aflatoxin B 1 ( AFB 1 ) is a carcinogen that inducing the liver cancer.
sentences.cn: 早年就有报道黄曲霉毒素B1 ( AFB1 ) 可以诱发肝癌.

sentences.en: Lead toxic to multiple organ systems animal carcinogen.
sentences.cn: 过去的研究表明,铅可引起多系统、多器官的损伤.

sentences.en: Management tactics range from using bone charcoal to soak up the carcinogen and then dispose of it as toxic waste to chemically transforming hexavalent chromium to a more benign form.
sentences.cn: 管理方法多样，简单的从使用骨炭吸收致癌物，然后把骨碳当作有毒废物扔掉，到高级的使用化学方法把六价铬转化成更良性的结构。

sentences.en: Paraffin is a known carcinogen, and hydrogen peroxide can harm the digestive system. Chopsticks irresponsibly disposed of can contaminate water and soil quality.
sentences.cn: 石蜡是一种已知的致癌物，而过氧化氢则对消化系统有害。随意丢弃木筷则可能污染水和土壤质量。

sentences.en: Sodium nitrite is easily converted to nitrite amine, which is a kind of carcinogen.
sentences.cn: 亚硝酸钠在人体内容易转变为亚硝胺, 是一种致癌物质.

trans.tran_en: a substance that can cause  cancer
